entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
